SELECT COUNT(*) as count, DATE(buytime) AS date FROM tw_lever_order WHERE 1=1 AND company_id = #{companyId} AND status = 2
AND buytime >= FROM_UNIXTIME(#{startTime}) AND buytime <= FROM_UNIXTIME(#{endTime})
AND buytime >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL #{days} DAY)
GROUP BY DATE(buytime) ORDER BY date ASC
